settings.title: Because every child deserves to shine
Green Valley is committed to admitting the most talented and deserving students regardless of their financial background, and ability to pay the cost of Green Valley education.

settings.title: Green Valley attracts the most diverse applicant pool among peer schools. Given the strong representation of all socioeconomic groups within that pool, the Academy sets no prescribed ceiling on family income when offering full scholarships.

settings.title: Green Valley does not encourage student loans. Instead, we believe in scholarship grants, allowing students to graduate without debt.

settings.title: Instructions for families applying for financial aid

Complete your Parents’ Financial Statement (PFS) online after October 05. To be eligible for consideration for financial aid at Green Valley, you must complete your PFS and submit your documents by February 10.

settings.title: Complete the Parent's Financial Statement online

settings.editor: Visit our website on or before October 05
Click "New Application" button and follow next instructions.
Set up your PFS Online account using your email address and a password.
Submit your application, and pay your $35 non-refundable fee to process your PFS.
After submitting your PFS, access the "Documents" section and upload additional documents we require here.
If online upload is not possible, you can send hard copy of documents to the registered mail address given below.

settings.title:
12, Olivers Street
P.O. Box 1234
New York City, 155 698
You can upload scanned copy of documents to our website via contact page, or send the hard copies to the mail address given aside.

settings.title: Financial aid scholarships are awarded through the generosity of alumni, parents, and friends of the Academy and are guaranteed through endowed scholarship funds.

In case of any query, please contact our financial aid committee.
We would be more than glad to help you.
